updateElements.mainContentHeader: Your device will restart to complete this update
updateElements.mainContentSubHeader: Updates can take 30 to 40 minutes to complete.
updateElements.mainContentText:
Your college-issued computer does not have the latest version of your current operating system.

As soon as you are able, please save your work and install updates. This keeps your machine running smoothly and securely. This update will require your machine to restart.

If you have any questions, please contact the ITS Help Desk at 717-358-6789, or submit a ticket at helpdesk.fandm.edu.
updateElements.mainHeader: Your computer requires a security update
